title: H. D. Deve Gowda
summary: Haradanahalli Doddegowda Deve Gowda // (listen) (born 18 May 1933)[1] is an Indian politician from the state of Karnataka. He served as the 12th prime minister of India from 1 June 1996 to 21 April 1997.[2] He was previously the 14th Chief Minister of Karnataka from 1994 to 1996. He presently is a Member of Parliament in the Rajya Sabha representing Karnataka. He is the National President of the Janata Dal (Secular) party.[3]
